front.title: Lightweight Directory Access Protocol (v3): Dynamic Attributes for the Remote Access Dialin User Service (RADIUS)

abstract.t: This document defines dynamic attributes used by the Remote Access Dialin User Service (RADIUS). These attributes are written to a dynamic directory service by the RADIUS server in order to provide information about sessions in progress. This information can then be used in order to provide for control of simultaneous logins, or for detection or tracking of security incidents in progress.
